channel.title: [PI] Auto Updating help

item.title: [PI] Auto Updating help
item.dc:creator: @johno johno
item.description:
@johno wrote:

I want the quest tab to auto update this code

                c.getPA().sendFrame126("@lre@Current slayer task", 29172);
                c.getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@" + Server.npcHandler.getNpcListName(c.slayerTask) + "", 29173);
                c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 29174);

Read full topic
